translations.This server has no working Internet conn: این سرور اتصال به اینترنت ندارد: چند نقطه انتهایی End Point قابل دسترسی نیست. این بدان معنی است که برخی از ویژگی های مانند نصب ذخیره سازی خارجی، اطلاع رسانی در مورد به روز رسانی و یا نصب برنامه های شخص ثالث کار نخواهد کرد. دسترسی به فایل ها از راه دور و ارسال ایمیل های اخبار Notification ممکن است کار نکند. پیشنهاد می کنیم اتصال اینترنت به این سرور را فعال کنید اگر می خواهید تمام ویژگی ها را داشته باشید.
translations.No memory cache has been configured. To: Memory Cache تنظیم نشده است, برای افزایش کارایی آن را فعال کنید . برای اطلاعات بیشتر به مستندات روجوع کنید
translations./dev/urandom is not readable by PHP whic: /dev/urandom در دسترس PHP نیست . برای اطلاعات بیشتر به مستندات روجوع کنید
You are currently running PHP {version}. We encourage you to upgrade your PHP version to take advantage of performance and security updates provided by the PHP Group as soon as your distribution supports it.
translations.The reverse proxy headers configuration: The reverse proxy headers configuration is incorrect, or you are accessing Nextcloud from a trusted proxy. If you are not accessing Nextcloud from a trusted proxy, this is a security issue and can allow an attacker to spoof their IP address as visible to Nextcloud. Further information can be found in our documentation.
translations.Memcached is configured as distributed c: Memcached is configured as distributed cache, but the wrong PHP module "memcache" is installed. \OC\Memcache\Memcached only supports "memcached" and not "memcache". See the memcached wiki about both modules.
translations.Some files have not passed the integrity: Some files have not passed the integrity check. Further information on how to resolve this issue can be found in our documentation. (List of invalid files… / Rescan…)
translations.The PHP OPcache is not properly configur: The PHP OPcache is not properly configured. For better performance we recommend to use following settings in the php.ini:
translations.The PHP function \"set_time_limit\" is n: The PHP function "set_time_limit" is not available. This could result in scripts being halted mid-execution, breaking your installation. We strongly recommend enabling this function.
translations.Error occurred while checking server set: خطا در هنگام چک کردن راه‌اندازی سرور رخ داده است
translations.Your data directory and your files are p: Your data directory and your files are probably accessible from the Internet. The .htaccess file is not working. It is strongly recommended that you configure your web server in a way that the data directory is no longer accessible or you move the data directory outside the web server document root.dd
translations.The \"{header}\" HTTP header is not conf: The "{header}" HTTP header is not configured to equal to "{expected}". This is a potential security or privacy risk and we recommend adjusting this setting.
translations.The \"Strict-Transport-Security\" HTTP h: The "Strict-Transport-Security" HTTP header is not configured to at least "{seconds}" seconds. For enhanced security we recommend enabling HSTS as described in our security tips.
translations.You are accessing this site via HTTP. We: You are accessing this site via HTTP. We strongly suggest you configure your server to require using HTTPS instead as described in our security tips.
